com.davidmiguel.gobees.addedithive

Class AddEditHivePresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.addedithive.AddEditHivePresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddEditHiveContract.Presenter, GoBeesDataSource.GetHiveCallback, GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback, BasePresenter

    class AddEditHivePresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddEditHiveContract.Presenter, GoBeesDataSource.GetHiveCallback, GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback
    Listens to user actions from the UI AddEditHiveFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.
